welcome_benefits: Bonus Reward Points of up to 3,000 points.

Movie & Dining: Buy 1 get 1 Free offer on movie tickets on Wednesdays.
Rewards Rate: On every Rs. 100 spent on groceries on Wednesday, you will get 1 Reward Point, For every Rs. 100 spent on all other transactions, you will get 1 Reward Point.
Reward Redemption: Redeem your reward points on payment of utility bills, phone recharge, hotel, and flight bookings, etc. 1 Reward Point = Re. 0.25.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off on spending Rs. 1 lakh or more in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver for all fuel transactions between Rs. 500 & Rs. 4,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount or Rs. 500 (whichever is higher)

product_details: Up to 3,000 reward points in the form of welcome benefits.
For every Rs. 100 spent, you will get 1 Reward Point.
5% value back on grocery purchases on Wednesdays.
Buy 1 Get 1 Free offer on BookMyShow on Wednesdays.
Up to 4,000 bonus reward points per year.
10% value back on dominos/Pizza Hut on Wednesdays.
The annual fee will be waived on the basis of the amount spent using this credit card.
